mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, MG.MEMBER_GRADE_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) POST_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_REPLY WHERE MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) REPLY_COUNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN GROUP_MEMBER GM ON(M.MEMBER_NO = GM.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER_GRADE MG ON(GM.MEMBER_GRADE_CODE = MG.MEMBER_GRADE_CODE) JOIN GROUPS G ON(G.GROUP_NO = GM.GROUP_NO) WHERE G.GROUP_NO =#{id}
